entry.title: Claiming an OP_RETURN Prefix
entry.summary: Lautaro, the Tech Lead of Po.et, uses colored coins to store data on the Bitcoin blockchain with a prefix "POET". He came across an old version of the OP_RETURN entry of the bitcoin wiki which stated that protocols wishing to claim OP_RETURN prefixes should use the standard Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIP) process. However, the entry seems to have changed recently and no longer mentions the BIP process. Lautaro is unsure whether they should be using the BIP process to claim a prefix and is seeking help or confirmation.
